Text.val: Author: Jerry Janssens (JJ)
Creation date: 12.07.2001
Last modified: 17.12.2001 (JJ)
22.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
//21.12.2004 BT SCR7557 changed CALL OSP007 (Parameter) RS
//26.02.2004 EE SCR5511 new parameter for mainscreen
//24.10.2003 EE SCR2413 add parameter for ODC_MainScreen
21.10.2003 JJ SCR4588 added tab 8
09.10.2003 JJ SCR4534 changed handling of "tab range"
06.03.2003 JJ SCR3095 changed task control close task to condition
29.01.2003 JJ SCR2898 switched "close window" task control to no
23.01.2003 JJ implemented new authorization/screen title concept
09.012003 JJ SCR2781 DEBC_DEBC and DEBC_DEBH now taken from DEBC instead of INVO
30.10.2002 JJ SCR2453 changed order DEBH_NO, DEBC_DEBC on screen
12.09.2002 JJ SCR2132 -dropped transaction+ rollback on cancel
-added generating an additional exit in event control (OSP105 didn't close)
-fixed fetching next?previous/first/last invo
20.06.2002 JJ SCR1510 Debtor client screen now activated with tab 5 active
19.06.2002 JJ SCR1520 realigned debtor heller number (left)
19.06.2002 JJ SCR1509 added argument to par pi.InvoiceButtonSelect call OSP007
22.05.2002 JJ SCR1307 realigned numeric fields (right)
17.12.2001 JJ SCR#501 included flag for call OSP007
- Added cycle on exit which calls OSP007 for new invoice selection
disabled if called as details.
-Added update of WTD with 'O' when Ok is pressed
10.12.2001 JJ SCR#445 added handling of event UA3 = Activate debtor
06.12.2001 JJ SCR#404 changed calls to tabscreens to Forward mode
29.11.2001 GP SCR#268 Add an extra parameter (3= pi.Called as details)
If this parameter is TRUE it means that the program is called
from a table screen and that this program must NOT do several EXIT
but in stead do a REFRESH (see block in TS)
20.11.2001 JJ SCR#242 continued, removed Clear CbB call from TS
14.11.2001 JJ SCR#242 Added Clear KbB (TP) in case of remaining exits
-If no tab is specified in the call, the default is the first tab (if
any) for which the user is authorised.
10,12,01 SCR444 Search criteria OSP007
Determine overall access right
if no parameter for selected invoice then try to use OSP007
Set flag so if called from ODC005 with INVO we don't call OSP007 in RS
//21.12.2004 BT SCR7557 changed CALL OSP007 (Parameter)
Set active tab according to parameter
When no tab selected get first tab for which the user is authorised
proceed only if an invoice number and tab are selected
currently assuming only existing invoices are selectable
Called as a detailscreen? -> remove EXIT's from keyboardbuffer and
generate a refresh (invoice can be changed)
<<< Refresh view >>>
O: Online
Standard menu is set here to OK/Cancel only
subtasks may have their own settings
A: Activate debtor, Call ODC001, return online
When Closing return to OSP007
//21.12.2004 BT SCR7557 changed CALL OSP007 (add 3 Parameters)
If returning without selection close else return online
O: Online
T: Tab, Commit and return Online
Check rights new tab
C: Cancel/Exit transactions on tab level so no rollback
S: Save/Ok, Commit and return online
A: Activate Debtor, commit and call ODC001 from parent
L: Locate next invoice and refresh
P: Locate previous invoice and refresh
E: get last invoice in range and refresh
B: get first invoice in range and refresh
R: refresh for browse
Main task is closed by update of v.Exit not by exit act
If we come here the user is allowed access to the selected tab so it
can be set as ORG tab

ItemsList.valUnicode: 1 Details, 2 Accounts, 3 Payment history, 4 Buying history, 5 Dispute history, 6 Dunning history, 7 Delcredere

Text.val: When tabing with CTRL+# set next tab accordingly
if new tab doesn'tt exist do nothing (stay with current tab)
tab event is used for 2 purposes
1: changing tabs
2: force commit and return online
